name: 执行人 Executor
description:
《Executor》It's a puzzle game.
In this house, there are many secret plots hidden behind the doors.
You will be unveiling all kinds of puzzles in this house by looking for the prompts and using them properly.
Although some scary scenes may appear, we believe that they won’t stop you from clearing all stages.
This game will only take you two to three hour to finish. It is a perfect game for your leisure time.
